column4: Guys, i just installed phpmyadmin, the installation went on fine, but i cant seem to be able to access it....(on the other hand SWAT works fine) Any suggestions?
have you installed apache and mysql, as well as PHP
and where did you install phpmyadmin - should be in /var/www/htdocs/phpmyadmin or near
i did an apt-get to get it...
wtf, i dont have an apache dir...
are you sure apache is installed?
sounds like you need to apt-get apache2
thats ok - I was an idoit once too - well until I switched to ubuntu
whats the full apt-get to fetch apache, mysql and php?
